TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/TrayNotify/AnimateBackground extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides a for an animated background of the notification area. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrayNotify.AnimateBackground.Normal%2A> property of the VisualStyleElement.TrayNotify.AnimateBackground class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> that represents an animated background of the notification area, which is located at the far right of the taskbar.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TrayNotify.AnimateBackground.Normal%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementTrayNotifyAnimateBackground1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#332](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/a0ff35df-f34b-4905-b036-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#332](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/a0ff35df-f34b-4905-b036-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents an animated background of the notification area.
Docs.value: A that represents an animated background of the notification area.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the Normal property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementTrayNotifyAnimateBackground1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#332](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/7ab9de44-b7ff-4765-a4df-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#332](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/7ab9de44-b7ff-4765-a4df-_1.vb)]
